subject: birdwatchers swear they can spot a bird from its jizz
body:
[this paragraph](https://books.google.com/books?id=y4lZDwAAQBAJ&pg=PT11&lpg=PT11&dq=%22Birdwatchers+swear+they+can+spot+a+bird+from+its+jizz%22&source=bl&ots=f7LEifYLd3&sig=ACfU3U3C6k-kBnaAwxOCB1ZOEVbnUBthwA&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjl_7fqi73uAhWkMX0KHXFkALgQ6AEwAHoECAIQAg#v=onepage&q=%22Birdwatchers%20swear%20they%20can%20spot%20a%20bird%20from%20its%20jizz%22&f=false), which someone shared at work and really made me lol:

"_Birdwatchers swear they can spot a bird from its_ **jizz**_. The word's origins are unknown, but some think it derives from aircraft reconnaissance in wartime and is short for 'general impression, size and shape. A bird's jizz means that a skilled birder can tell you the breed even if it is just a blur flying past in the dusk. A writer's voice is like that too, perhaps. A skilled reader can spot it from a single sentence_."

this bit of a rupi kaur poem (or entire poem, unclear from screenshot) that another coworker shared

"_i will never know_

_this version of me again_

_let me slow down_

_and be with her_"

the sensation, when you are writing a script to automate a task, when you've nailed it down and suddenly all the units click into place and you're watching a machine you've made run on its own, the logs describing its progress ticking away in the console

we started watching _bling empire_, the (elevator pitch) reality show version of _crazy rich asians_ in LA. besides a brief dip into _real housewives of salt lake city_ i haven't watched a reality show like this for a while and i'm really enjoying it—the characters are so distinctive and interesting (while having a strange metatextual relationship to _crazy rich asians)_ and the show is all over the place tonally in a way that (also netflix includes much less filler=y repetition and previewing in their reality shows, which i am infinitely grateful for, since that's a phenomenon that's really turned me off for a lot of reality tv i'd otherwise enjoy)

k dming our double date group chat after i posted a clip of watching _bling empire_ to ig and us geeking out about it together at length

the capo d got for my classical guitar and the pretty high sound of a capoed guitar, a tonal tweak i love even independent of the primary benefit of easily transposing a song without relearning it

long facetime with h, in which among other things she described how her coronavirus-driven loss of taste did not make a green juice more palatable and posed the question "is barney dead?"

the feeling when you are so excited about what you're having for dinner that you think about it all day (and especially when that thing is _leftovers_, as it is here, truly a victory)

d beat _hades_ last night (without ever enabling god mode)

it's friday and of my two meetings today, one is a half hour session in which i will play tetris 99 with two coworkers
